activity.definition:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><Workflow_CustomOperationDefinition outputs="<outputs />" inputs="<inputs><ClientGroupName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"></ClientGroupName></inputs>" operation="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?>
<App_PerformClientGroupReq clientGroupOperationType="3">
	<clientGroupDetail description="">
		<clientGroup clientGroupName="java:{activity.getInput(&quot;ClientGroupName&quot;)}:java"/>
	</clientGroupDetail>
</App_PerformClientGroupReq>"><script language="1" script="/*
to access xml response use: XML xml = activity.getXmlResponse();
to retrieve values via xpath you can use: String value = xml.selectSingleNode("string(/path/to/node)");
to set outputs of the activity use: activity.setOutput("outputName", value);
*/
" /></Workflow_CustomOperationDefinition>
